page.title: 04 AYNHO:CLUBS & SOCIETIES (1)
page.content: The {BROWNIES} meet on Tuesdays in the school for an hour every week. There are 13 girls aged 7-10yrs. They play games and work for badges. They wear a brown uniform. Some of the girls come from other villages. The nearest {CUB SCOUTS} for Aynho boys aged 8-11yrs is at Kings Sutton. They also wear a uniform and play games and work for badges. The {GOOD COMPANIONS} is a club for old people over the age of 60yrs. They meet in the Village Hall on alternate Wednesdays for a chat and a cup of tea Sometimes they go on outings. Some of the members come from Croughton. The {FITNESS & NUTRITION} Club meets in the Village Hall on Thursdays. It is for ladies who do physical exercises to keep themselves fit and healthy. Some of the members come from other villages.
